_rulesutils module (daxfi package).

This module provide utilities for both the RuleBuilder and Rule classes.

  transf_sort  
transf_sort ( v )

For options that need to be sorted.

Given a string with comma separated items, these items are sorted; if portions of the string are sparated by slashes, the order of these groups is preserved.
